Package gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.ViewControls

Interface Summary
IColorScaleAddible This interface is implemented by view components that utilize the ControlColorScale with calibrations.
ISceneController A ViewController object controls the observers position for one or more GL_Panel objects.
IViewControl Any class that implements this interface will be used to adjust settings on the IViewComponent.
 

Class Summary
AltAzController An AltAzController object controls the Observers position for one or more 3D panel objects by allowing the user to specify their position relative to the view reference point.
ButtonControl This class is a ViewControl (ActiveJPanel) with a generic button for use by ViewComponents.
CheckedControl This is a ViewControl that has a checkbox, label, and another "sub" ViewControl placed side-by-side.
ColorControl This is a type of ViewControl that allows the user to select colors.
CompositeContourControl This ViewControl was designed specifically for the ContourViewComponent.
ControlCheckbox This class is a ViewControl (ActiveJPanel) with a generic checkbox for use by ViewComponents.
ControlCheckboxButton This class is a ViewControl (ActiveJPanel) with a generic checkbox and button for use by ViewComponents.
ControlCheckboxCombobox This is control that has a checkbox with a combobox next to it.
ControlCheckboxSpinner This is a control that has a checkbox with a spinner next to it.
ControlColorScale This class is a ViewControl (ActiveJPanel) with a color scale for use by ViewComponents.
ControlList This class is a ViewControl that allows the user to enter a list of values.
ControlManager This class allows control values for similar controls to be shared.
ControlSlider This class is an ViewControl (ActiveJPanel) with a generic slider for use by ViewComponents.
CursorOutputControl This class is a ViewControl (ActiveJPanel) with text fields set up for cursor output.
FieldEntryControl This class is a ViewControl (ActiveJPanel) with labels and input text fields set up for the user to input values.
FormatControl This class is a ViewControl (ActiveJPanel) with a ...
FrameController A FrameController object is a GUI component for controlling a sequence of displayed images.
FunctionControls  
LabelCombobox This class is a ViewControl (ActiveJPanel) consisting of a JLabel descriptor and a JComboBox.
PanViewControl This view control is used to "pan" an image.
RangeControl This class is a ViewControl with text fields set up for entering and displaying ranges.
SceneController A SceneController object controls the observers position for one or more 3d panel objects.
SpinnerControl This class is a ViewControl that allows the user to specify a value from a range of values using a JSpinner.
TabbedViewControl This is a 'container' ViewControl that contains a number of ViewControls in it.
TabbedViewControl.TabValuePair Class that encapsulates a value (for a ViewControl) and the index of the tab that contains the ViewControl.
ViewControl Any class that extends this class will be used to adjust settings on the IViewComponent.
ViewControlMaker This class is to quickly convert JComponents to ViewControls.
ViewControlsPanel This class is to create a JPanel of ViewControls that has the capability to add ActionListeners (adding an ActionListener to this class adds it to all of the ViewControls in the JPanel of controls), and to allow for outside setting of the layout.
